title: 24 Iranians, Held for Illegal Entry, Escape From Iraqi Prison
body:
Iraqi police confirm prison escape of 24 Iranians detained for entering country illegally; wave of kidnappings and 
sectarian violence stoke fears throughout country; Shiite-dominated Iraqi government appears to reach out to Sunni 
Arabs in effort to end boycott of Parliament; photo.

Graphic

 

Photograph
